content.query:
CREATE TABLE [Sent].[NATO_Sentiment]
(
    [id] bigint  NULL,
	[created_at] DATETIME2(7)  NULL,
	[text] NVARCHAR(4000)  NULL,
	[cleantext] NVARCHAR(4000)  NULL,
	[lang] nvarchar(10)  NULL,
	[retweet_count] INT  NULL,
	[reply_count] INT  NULL,
	[like_count] INT  NULL,
	[quote_count] INT  NULL,
	[impression_count] INT  NULL,
    [topic] SMALLINT NULL,
    [topic_0_confidence] REAL NULL,
    [topic_1_confidence] REAL NULL,
    [topic_2_confidence] REAL NULL,
    [topic_3_confidence] REAL NULL,
    [topic_4_confidence] REAL NULL,
    [Sentiment] NVARCHAR(10) NULL,
    [Negative_Score] REAL NULL,
    [Positive_Score] REAL NULL,
    [Neutral_Score] REAL NULL,
    [Mixed_Score] REAL NULL
)

GO
